item.description:
Enjoy a fun night of laughter with Howie Mandel!

Meet 5:30 pm for dinner at Ding Ho Chinese (38 Southbridge St)
If you prefer to skip dinner, you may meet us at the theatre at 6:45 pm.
Performance starts at 7 pm
My cell is: 508-381-1529

Cost is $57 including taxes and surcharges. Once you pay, I will purchase your ticket. You may also purchase your own ticket if you like, but still RSVP yes and state in your comments you have your ticket. Try to get your ticket near us in orchestra left. We are in rows N, O, & P.

Click here for more information on the famous, successful comedian, Howie Mandel...

Parking/Directions Info
Federal Garage is $10, but you can find free meter parking on the street.
GPS: Instead of the actual Hanover address, they recommend using 554 Main Street
item.name: Howie Mandel Live!
